name: COVID-19 AR Portal and Tracker
description:
Further your knowledge about COVID-19, the symptoms of COVID-19 (common and less common ones) and how COVID-19 spread and HOW to avoid it.

App also features LIVE data for the number of COVID-19 cases worldwide and countries such as Singapore and the US.

No longer you need to open your browser to check the number of cases today! You can check directly from this app!
